content:
#  Procedure for completion of the course of study and submission of doctoral dissertations -- AGH University Doctoral School 

URL: https://www.sd.agh.edu.pl/en/doctoral-students/procedure-for-completion-of-the-course-of-study-and-submission-of-doctoral-dissertations
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:21:52

Skip to content

Skip to footer

 Procedure for completion of the course of study and submission of doctoral dissertations 

Decision no 4/2024
 issued by the AGH Doctoral School Director
 of 19 March 2024

amending Guidelines for completion of the course of study and submission of doctoral dissertations at the AGH Doctoral School

§ 1

In accordance with Par. (4)(1)(3) of the AGH Doctoral School Study Regulations introduced by the AGH-UST Senate Decision no. 28/2023 of 22 March 2023 I hereby officially lay down guidelines for completion of the course of study and submission of doctoral dissertations in 2024 at the AGH Doctoral School.

§ 2

The guidelines for completion of the course of study and submission of doctoral dissertation at the AGH Doctoral School constitute Annex no. 1 to this Decision.

AGH Doctoral School Director

    professor Marcin Szpyrka   

Guidelines for completion of the course of study and submission of doctoral dissertations at the AGH Doctoral School

The title page of a doctoral dissertation - template (Appendix 1)
 in Polish

Doctoral dissertation submission statement - template (Appendix 2) 
in Polish

Supervisor’s/Auxiliary Supervisor’s Review - template (Appendix 3)

Statements determining individual contribution to the doctoral dissertation on a qualitative and percentage basis - template (Appendix 4)
 in Polish

Certificate of completing a course of study at the AGH Doctoral School - template (Appendix 5)
 in Polish

Request for confidentiality protection for a doctoral dissertation - template (Appendix 6)

Stopka
